name: Digital Glider Airman
overview: Fly different gliders in this flight simulator game, the player can choose between different game modes: challenge, extra mode, test mode or practice mode. All in a 3d world with different places to fly in each mission from cities to highways, mountains, etc. There are different gliders and the player can design and configure the one he choose: change every part of the plane color, calibrate the tails, body & wings.
